desc: Searching for camping, hiking, backpacking, survival and preparedness gear that is made, manufactured or assembled in the USA, then look no further. Hometown Preps is a veteran owned and operated small business that is here to deliver on those needs for you.10% of annual owner's profits donated to veterans organization

layout.text: If you like the idea of buying your outdoor merch from a vendor that prioritizes "American Made" and supports Veterans' organizations, you're on the right website! 10% of annual owner's profits will be donated to veteran's organizations. Thank you for your support!!
